function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear or unreadable signage regarding social distancing measures","Impact":"Failure to adhere to social distancing guidelines, leading to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Ensure that all signage is clear, readable, and easily understandable from a distance","Technologies":"High-quality printing, clear font design, and proper color contrast","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to the store","Owner":"Retailers, signage designers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Mix of informal and professional signs","Impact":"Confusion and inconsistency in messaging, leading to potential misunderstanding of social distancing protocols","Mitigation":"Standardize signage with clear, consistent messaging and design, and remove outdated or conflicting signs","Technologies":"Digital signage platforms for easy updating, standardized design templates for printed signs","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to the store","Owner":"Retailers, signage designers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Longevity of professional signs","Impact":"Outdated information leading to ineffective communication of current social distancing measures","Mitigation":"Implement a system for regular review and updating of professional signs to ensure accuracy and relevance","Technologies":"Digital signage with remote updating capabilities, centralized design and approval processes for sign updates","People":"Customers, employees, and visitors to the store","Owner":"Retailers, signage designers, and public health authorities"}]}
